column2: Your Banner has been raised here, thus this county will not be distributed.
column3: Your Banner has been raised here. This county will not be distributed.
column4: Dein Banner wurde hier gehisst.
column6: Your Banner has been raised here. This county will not be distributed.

column2: Distribute All Holdings
column3: Distribute All Holdings
column4: Verteilt alle Besitzungen.
column6: Distribute All Holdings

column2: Grants all baronies, cities, bishoprics, and counties to newly created vassals. You must "Raise Your Banner" on at least one province to use this.
column3: Grants all baronies, cities, bishoprics, and counties to newly created vassals. You must "Raise Your Banner" on at least one province to use this.
column4: Verteilt alle Besitzungen (Baronien, Bistümer und Städte) an neu erstellte Vasallen. Dazu muss der Spielen in mindestens einer Provinz sein Banner gehisst haben.
column6: Grants all baronies, cities, bishoprics, and counties to newly created vassals. You must "Raise Your Banner" on at least one province to use this.

column2: Hand out all holdings.
column3: Hand out all holdings.
column4: Alle Besitzungen verteilen
column6: Hand out all holdings.

column2: Raise Your Banner
column3: Raise Your Banner
column4: Banner hissen
column6: Raise Your Banner

column2: Prevents the primary holding in your current ruler's location from being distributed.
column3: Prevents the primary holding in your current ruler's location from being distributed.
column4: Schließt die Hauptbesitzung dieser Provinz von der Verteilung aus.
column6: Prevents the primary holding in your current ruler's location from being distributed.

column2: Raise Your Banner
column3: Raise Your Banner
column4: Banner hissen
column6: Raise Your Banner

column2: Lower Your Banner
column3: Lower Your Banner
column4: Banner einholen
column6: Lower Your Banner

column2: Allows the primary holding here to be distributed.
column3: Allows the primary holding here to be distributed.
column4: Die Hauptbesitzung dieser Provinz wird ebenfalls verteilt.
column6: Allows the primary holding here to be distributed.

column2: Lower your banner
column3: Lower your banner
column4: Banner einholen
column6: Lower your banner

column2: Marshal Raises Banner
column3: Marshal Raises Banner
column4: Der Marschall hisst das Banner
column6: Marshal Raises Banner

column2: Have the Marshal raise your banner at his location. Prevents the primary holding there from being distributed.
column3: Have the Marshal raise your banner at his location. Prevents the primary holding there from being distributed.
column4: Lässt den Marschall das Banner hissen und die Hauptbesitzung von der Verteilung ausschließen
column6: Have the Marshal raise your banner at his location. Prevents the primary holding there from being distributed.

column2: Marshal raises your banner.
column3: Marshal raises your banner.
column4: Der Marschall hisst das Banner
column6: Marshal raises your banner.

column2: Marshal Lowers Banner
column3: Marshal Lowers Banner
column4: Der Marschall holt das Banner ein
column6: Marshal Lowers Banner

column2: Have the Marshal lower your banner at his location. Allows the primary holding there to be distributed.
column3: Have the Marshal lower your banner at his location. Allows the primary holding there to be distributed.
column4: Lässt den Marschall das Banner einholen und die Hauptbesitzung wieder bei der Verteilung einschließen.
column6: Have the Marshal lower your banner at his location. Allows the primary holding there to be distributed.

column2: Marshal lowers your banner.
column3: Marshal lowers your banner.
column4: Der Marschall holt das Banner ein
column6: Marshal lowers your banner.

column2: Your banners unfurl in the wind. The knights intimidate the peasants until they cheer for you.
column3: Your banners unfurl in the wind. The knights intimidate the peasants until they cheer for you.
column4: Dein Banner weht im Wind. Unter den drohenden Blicken Eurer Kämpfer jubelt Euch das Volk zu.
column6: Your banners unfurl in the wind. The knights intimidate the peasants until they cheer for you.

column2: You bask in your glory.
column3: You bask in your glory.
column4: Sonnt Euch in Eurem Ruhm!
column6: You bask in your glory.

column2: Your steward gathers up your belongings and the peasants cheer as you ride out the gate.
column4: Der Verwalter sammelt Eure Sachen zusammen und das Volk jubelt, als Ihr aus dem Tor reitet

column2: This castle was a bit drafty anyway.
column3: This castle was a bit drafty anyway.
column4: Diese Burg war ohnehin ziemlich muffig.
column6: This castle was a bit drafty anyway.

column2: Your Marshal has claimed a province in your name.
column3: Your Marshal has claimed a province in your name.
column4: Eure Marschall hat eine Provinz in Eurem Namen beansprucht.
column6: Your Marshal has claimed a province in your name.

column2: I'll be sure to thank him.
column3: I'll be sure to thank him.
column4: Ich werde ihm meinen Dank zukommen lassen.
column6: I'll be sure to thank him.

column2: At your bidding, the Marshal has instructed for your banners to be brought down and the castle vacated.
column3: At your bidding, the Marshal has instructed for your banners to be brought down and the castle vacated.
column4: Auf Eure Anweisungen hat der Marschall die Banner einholen und die Burg verwaisen lassen.
column6: At your bidding, the Marshal has instructed for your banners to be brought down and the castle vacated.

column2: Time to find another ungrateful vassal to give it to.
column3: Time to find another ungrateful vassal to give it to.
column4: Zeit einen weiteren undankbaren Vasallen zu finden, dem wir es schenken können.
column6: Time to find another ungrateful vassal to give it to.

column2: You divide the conquered lands amongst your nobles and hire bards to compose ballads of your skill and cunning.
column3: You divide the conquered lands amongst your nobles and hire bards to compose ballads of your skill and cunning.
column4: Ihr verteilt das Land unter Euren Adeligen und lasst Lieder auf Eure Weisheit singen.
column6: You divide the conquered lands amongst your nobles and hire bards to compose ballads of your skill and cunning.

column2: My ambition cannot be slaked!
column3: My ambition cannot be slaked!
column4: Mein Ehrgeiz ist unstillbar!
column6: My ambition cannot be slaked!
